item.description: Lecture 1: Introduction to Econometrics class: center, middle, inverse, title-slide # Lecture 1: Introduction to Econometrics ## ECON 480 - Econometrics - Fall 2018 ### Ryan Safner ### August 27, 2018 --- class: inverse, center, middle # What is Econometrics? --- # Why Everyone, Yes *Everyone*, Should Learn Statistics .center[.image-40[![\href{https://www.smbc-comics.com/comic/why-i-couldn39t-be-a-math-teacher}{SMBC}](https://www.dropbox.com/s/xd47zns2riqtwzz/smbcmathteacher.png?raw=1)]] --- # Why Everyone, Yes *Everyone*, Should Learn Statistics .center[.image-30[![\href{https://www.smbc-comics.com/comic/2010-12-01}{SMBC}](https://www.dropbox.com/s/114jbjtdakritv0/smbc2080stats.png?raw=1)]] --- # We're Not so Good at Statistics - Votes in the U.
